name: keeri
description:
Brought new design to [Nault](https://nault.cc) with dark mode, new landing pages for wallet import and new users, mobile layouts, representative monitoring features and more.

Illustrates Nano's microtransaction capabilities in an indie game [Raesonic](https://raesonic.com) ([Reddit post](https://www.reddit.com/r/nanocurrency/comments/fb2itj/ive_implemented_nano_microtransactions_in_my/)), and a classic gamemode [JC2RP](https://earn-nano.com/jc2rp) ([see on network explorer](https://www.nanolooker.com/account/nano_1jcrp97qsqcnnmsqtdud5p6f6k7a95g6635149akj63fyybpt8sdyq6tyxsr)).

Created [Nanoidenticons](https://keerifox.github.io/Nanoidenticons/), some [Nano Infographics](https://imgur.com/a/tPaK9hp), a [magical banner ad graphic](https://i.imgur.com/skl9l3k.png) and the original [r/CryptoCurrency coin badges](https://imgur.com/a/IBZHDpE).
